snippet.title: Project Code Neon Mafia Nintendo Switch™ Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the reveal trailer for the Nintendo Switch™ Digital Software
Project Code Neon Mafia!

"From the depths of a neon city comes a declaration of war."


◆Summary◆
Young members of the Mafia fight, rebel, and entrust their hopes to their friends to fight corruption, confront evil, and challenge fate.

◆2023 Announcement Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/newtitle2023/english/

◆X（Twitter）
https://adag.jp/Voltage_Switch_X/

◆Official Portal Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Participating Creators◆
Director: Ichika Shiina
Scenario: Ririka Yoshimura
Illustrator: Takao
Backgrounds: Studio COCOLO
BGM: Shunsuke Tsuchiya
Theme
Vocals/Lyrics: Shihoko Hirata
Comp./Arr.: Shunsuke Tsuchiya

※"Project Code Neon Mafia" is the name of the project and not the official title of the game.
